job_description:
Overview
We are looking for upbeat, personable, and sales driven individuals to accurately represent our brand, provide our clients with exceptional customer service, and cultivate long-term customer relationships.
BENEFITS:
• Competitive hourly pay PLUS uncapped commission earnings on ALL sales – you control your paycheck!
• Quarterly Raise Reviews – we want to REWARD YOU!
• Up to $2,000 per year in Student Tuition Assistance
• Up to $800 per year in Student Loan Payback Assistance
• 401(k) with company match
• Paid Time Off (PTO) for Full-time positions
• Health & Dental Insurance for Full-time positions
• Constant career growth and advancement opportunities
• Free tanning and associate discounts

Our ideal applicant is highly motivated to set and achieve sales goals, thrive on a commission-driven environment, and has a desire to build a career in the skincare industry.
Responsibilities
• Meeting sales quotas, measured daily/weekly/monthly
• Consulting customers in a professional, upbeat manner
• Proactively building loyalty and long-term relationships with customers
• Maintaining a clean and organized salon
• Cash handling, opening/closing business
• Daily administrative paperwork, and goal tracking

Qualifications
• Ability to work 15-30 hours per week for part-time, ability to work 35-40 hours per week for full-time
• Reliable transportation, and flexible availability including nights & weekends
• Customer service experience
• Friendly competitive drive to meet monthly sales goals
• Polished professional appearance
• Excellent communication skills
• Attention to detail and organization
• Ability to multitask in a fast-paced environment
• Ability to stand, bend, walk for 5-8 hours per day
